11.1: You have 10 sec. left. Those of you unable to beat the game, we hope you beat it next time! Great job, everyone!! See you later~

2.1: The portal has now opened. Press the up arrow key at the portal to enter.

4.1: Ola Ola consists of 3 levels of stage, and there's only one portal that'll take you to the next level. Other portals are either not open, or will take you to a strange place, so you need to be careful choosing the right portal.

5.1: Please remember the fake portals; that way you won't have to go through it again. Good luck!

6.1: Everyone that clears Ola Ola on time wil be given an item, regardless of the order of finish, so just relax, take your time, and select the correct portals.

7.1: The number of portals will increase as you move up the level.

8.1: We're halfway through the time-limit. Please carefully choose the correct portal.

9.1: You have 2 minutes left. If you're on level 1, then please hurry!!
